Cunlzexe.cpp

00001 /*
00002  * Cunlzexe.cpp
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 29.12.2009
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  *
00007  *  This modified version is mainly C++ Code and attemps
00008  *  to store the uncompressed data in the memory first.*
00009  */
00010 
00011 #include "Cunlzexe.h"
00012 /* unlzexe ver 0.5 (PC-VAN UTJ44266 Kou )
00013 *   UNLZEXE converts the compressed file by lzexe(ver.0.90,0.91) to the
00014 *   UNcompressed executable one.
00015 *
00016 *   usage:  UNLZEXE packedfile[.EXE] [unpackedfile.EXE]
00017 
00018 v0.6  David Kirschbaum, Toad Hall, kirsch@usasoc.soc.mil, Jul 91
00019  Problem reported by T.Salmi (ts@uwasa.fi) with UNLZEXE when run
00020  with TLB-V119 on 386's.
00021  Stripping out the iskanji and isjapan() stuff (which uses a somewhat
00022  unusual DOS interrupt) to see if that's what's biting us.
00023 
00024 --  Found it, thanks to Dan Lewis (DLEWIS@SCUACC.SCU.EDU).
00025  Silly us:  didn't notice the "r.h.al=0x3800;" in isjapan().
00026  Oh, you don't see it either?  INT functions are called with AH
00027  having the service.  Changing to "r.x.ax=0x3800;".
00028 
00029 v0.7  Alan Modra, amodra@sirius.ucs.adelaide.edu.au, Nov 91
00030     Fixed problem with large files by casting ihead components to long
00031     in various expressions.
00032     Fixed MinBSS & MaxBSS calculation (ohead[5], ohead[6]).  Now UNLZEXE
00033     followed by LZEXE should give the original file.
00034 
00035 v0.8  Vesselin Bontchev, bontchev@fbihh.informatik.uni-hamburg.de, Aug 92
00036     Fixed recognition of EXE files - both 'MZ' and 'ZM' in the header
00037     are recognized.
00038     Recognition of compressed files made more robust - now just
00039     patching the 'LZ90' and 'LZ91' strings will not fool the program.
00040 
00041 v0.81 Embedded Version for CG by gerstrong. This version only does
00042  operations in the memory as the file is already read, and can be used
00043  straight forward. Stripped down a lot of obsolete old DOS Code
00044 */
00045 
00046 #include <stdlib.h>
00047 #include <stdio.h>
00048 #include <string.h>
00049 #include <string>
00050 
00051 #define FAILURE 1
00052 #define SUCCESS 0
00053 
00054 Cunlzexe::Cunlzexe() :
00055 m_headersize(0)
00056 {}
00057 
00058 WORD_16BIT Cunlzexe::get16bitWord(BYTE *p_data)
00059 {
00060     WORD_16BIT value = (WORD_16BIT) *(p_data);
00061     value+= ((WORD_16BIT) *(p_data+1))<<8;
00062     return value;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void Cunlzexe::put16bitWord(WORD_16BIT value, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata)
00066 {
00067  outdata.push_back( value&0xFF );
00068  outdata.push_back( value>>8 );
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool Cunlzexe::decompress(BYTE *compressed_data, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata){
00072 
00073     int ver=0;
00074 
00075     if(rdhead(compressed_data,&ver)!=SUCCESS){
00076         return false;
00077     }
00078     if(mkreltbl(compressed_data, outdata,ver)!=SUCCESS) {
00079         return false;
00080     }
00081     m_headersize = outdata.size();
00082     if(unpack(compressed_data, outdata)!=SUCCESS) {
00083         return false;
00084     }
00085     wrhead(outdata);
00086 
00087     return true;
00088 }
00089

00155 /* EXE header test (is it LZEXE file?) */
00156 int Cunlzexe::rdhead(BYTE *data_ptr ,int *ver){
00157     long entry;
00158 
00159     memcpy(ihead, data_ptr, sizeof ihead);
00160     memcpy (ohead, ihead, sizeof ohead);
00161     if((ihead [0] != 0x5a4d && ihead [0] != 0x4d5a) ||
00162       ihead [0x0d] != 0 || ihead [0x0c] != 0x1c)
00163      return FAILURE;
00164     entry = ((long) (ihead [4] + ihead[0x0b]) << 4) + ihead[0x0a];
00165 
00166     memcpy(sigbuf, &data_ptr[entry], sizeof sigbuf);
00167     if (memcmp (sigbuf, sig90, sizeof sigbuf) == 0) {
00168      *ver = 90;
00169      return SUCCESS;
00170     }
00171     if (memcmp (sigbuf, sig91, sizeof sigbuf) == 0) {
00172      *ver = 91;
00173      return SUCCESS;
00174     }
00175     return FAILURE;
00176 }
00177 
00178 /* make relocation table */
00179 int Cunlzexe::mkreltbl(BYTE *p_data, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata,int ver) {
00180     long fpos;
00181     int i;
00182 
00183     fpos=(long)(ihead[0x0b]+ihead[4])<<4;  /* goto CS:0000 */
00184     memcpy(inf, &p_data[fpos],  (sizeof inf[0]) *  0x08);
00185     ohead[0x0a]=inf[0];  /* IP */
00186     ohead[0x0b]=inf[1];  /* CS */
00187     ohead[0x08]=inf[2];  /* SP */
00188     ohead[0x07]=inf[3];  /* SS */
00189     /* inf[4]:size of compressed load module (PARAGRAPH)*/
00190     /* inf[5]:increase of load module size (PARAGRAPH)*/
00191     /* inf[6]:size of decompressor with  compressed relocation table (BYTE) */
00192     /* inf[7]:check sum of decompresser with compressd relocation table(Ver.0.90) */
00193     ohead[0x0c]=0x1c;  /* start position of relocation table */
00194     outdata.assign(0x1cL,0);
00195 
00196     switch(ver){
00197     case 90: i=reloc90(p_data, outdata, fpos);
00198              break;
00199     case 91: i=reloc91(p_data, outdata, fpos);
00200              break;
00201     default: i=FAILURE; break;
00202     }
00203     if(i!=SUCCESS){
00204         printf("error at relocation table.\n");
00205         return (FAILURE);
00206     }
00207 
00208     fpos = outdata.size();
00209     i= (0x200 - (int) fpos) & 0x1ff;
00210     ohead[4]= (int) ((fpos+i)>>4);
00211 
00212     for( ; i>0; i--)
00213      outdata.push_back(0);
00214 
00215     return(SUCCESS);
00216 }
00217 /* for LZEXE ver 0.90 */
00218 int Cunlzexe::reloc90(BYTE *p_data, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata, long fpos) {
00219     unsigned int c;
00220     WORD_16BIT rel_count=0;
00221     WORD_16BIT rel_seg,rel_off;
00222 
00223      p_data += fpos+0x19d;
00224 
00225     rel_seg=0;
00226     do{
00227         c=get16bitWord(p_data);
00228         p_data += 2;
00229         for(;c>0;c--) {
00230             rel_off=get16bitWord(p_data);
00231             p_data += 2;
00232 
00233             put16bitWord(rel_off, outdata);
00234             put16bitWord(rel_seg, outdata);
00235             rel_count++;
00236         }
00237         rel_seg += 0x1000;
00238     } while(rel_seg != static_cast<WORD_16BIT>(0xf000+0x1000));
00239     ohead[3]=rel_count;
00240     return(SUCCESS);
00241 }
00242 /* for LZEXE ver 0.91*/
00243 int Cunlzexe::reloc91(BYTE *p_data, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata, long fpos) {
00244     WORD_16BIT span;
00245     WORD_16BIT rel_count=0;
00246     WORD_16BIT rel_seg,rel_off;
00247 
00248     p_data += fpos+0x158;
00249         /* 0x158=compressed relocation table address */
00250     WORD_16BIT temp;
00251     rel_off=0; rel_seg=0;
00252     for(;;) {
00253      temp = *p_data;
00254      p_data++;
00255         if((span=temp)==0) {
00256             span = (BYTE) *p_data;
00257             p_data++;
00258             span+= ((BYTE) *p_data)<<8;
00259             p_data++;
00260             if(span==0){
00261                 rel_seg += 0x0fff;
00262                 continue;
00263             } else if(span==1){
00264                 break;
00265             }
00266         }
00267         rel_off += span;
00268         rel_seg += (rel_off & ~0x0f)>>4;
00269         rel_off &= 0x0f;
00270         put16bitWord(rel_off, outdata);
00271         put16bitWord(rel_seg, outdata);
00272         rel_count++;
00273     }
00274     ohead[3]=rel_count;
00275     return(SUCCESS);
00276 }
00277 
00278 /*---------------------*/
00279 /* decompression routine */
00280 int Cunlzexe::unpack(BYTE *p_input, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata){
00281     int len;
00282     short span;
00283     bitstream bits;
00284     //static BYTE data[0x4500], *p=data;
00285     BYTE data[0x4500], *p=data;
00286     unsigned long inpos;
00287     unsigned long outpos;
00288     unsigned long initial_outpos;
00289 
00290     inpos = ((long)ihead[0x0b]-(long)inf[4]+(long)ihead[4])<<4;
00291     initial_outpos = outpos = (long)ohead[4]<<4;
00292     initbits(&bits, p_input, inpos);
00293     printf(" unpacking.");
00294     for(;;){
00295 
00296         if(p-data>0x4000){
00297          if(outdata.size() < 0x2000+outpos)
00298           outdata.resize(0x2000+outpos);
00299          memcpy(&outdata[0]+outpos, data, (sizeof data[0])*0x2000);
00300          outpos += 0x2000;
00301             p-=0x2000;
00302             //memcpy(data,data+0x2000,p-data);
00303             memmove(data,data+0x2000,p-data);
00304             putchar('.');
00305         }
00306         if(getbit(&bits, inpos)) {
00307          *p++=p_input[inpos];
00308          inpos++;
00309             continue;
00310         }
00311         if(!getbit(&bits, inpos)) {
00312             len=getbit(&bits, inpos)<<1;
00313             len |= getbit(&bits, inpos);
00314             len += 2;
00315             span = p_input[inpos] | 0xff00;
00316             inpos++;
00317         } else {
00318          span = p_input[inpos];
00319          inpos++;
00320          len = p_input[inpos];
00321          inpos++;
00322             span |= ((len & ~0x07)<<5) | 0xe000;
00323             len = (len & 0x07)+2;
00324             if (len==2) {
00325                 len = p_input[inpos];
00326                 inpos++;
00327 
00328                 if(len==0)
00329                     break;    /* end mark of compressed load module */
00330 
00331                 if(len==1)
00332                     continue; /* segment change */
00333                 else
00334                     len++;
00335             }
00336         }
00337         for( ;len>0;len--,p++){
00338             *p=*(p+span);
00339         }
00340     }
00341     if(p!=data)
00342     {
00343      long size = (sizeof data[0])*(p-data);
00344      unsigned long vec_size = outdata.size();
00345      if(vec_size < size+outpos)
00346       outdata.resize(size+outpos);
00347         memcpy(&outdata[0]+outpos, data, size);
00348         outpos += size;
00349     }
00350     loadsize=outpos-initial_outpos;
00351     printf("end\n");
00352     return(SUCCESS);
00353 }
00354 
00355 /* write EXE header*/
00356 void Cunlzexe::wrhead(std::vector<BYTE> &outdata) {
00357     if(ihead[6]!=0) {
00358  ohead[5]-= inf[5] + ((inf[6]+16-1)>>4) + 9; /* v0.7 */
00359         if(ihead[6]!=0xffff)
00360             ohead[6]-=(ihead[5]-ohead[5]);
00361     }
00362     ohead[1]=((WORD_16BIT)loadsize+(ohead[4]<<4)) & 0x1ff; /* v0.7 */
00363     ohead[2]=(WORD_16BIT)((loadsize+((long)ohead[4]<<4)+0x1ff) >> 9); /* v0.7 */
00364 
00365     memcpy(&outdata[0], ohead, (sizeof ohead[0])*0x0e );
00366 }

00369 
00370 /* get compress information bit by bit */
00371 void Cunlzexe::initbits(bitstream *p, BYTE *p_data, unsigned long &inpos){
00372  p->pdata = p_data;
00373     p->count=0x10;
00374     p->buf=get16bitWord(&p_data[inpos]);
00375     inpos += 2;
00376 }
00377 
00378 int Cunlzexe::getbit(bitstream *p, unsigned long &inpos) {
00379     int b;
00380     b = p->buf & 1;
00381     if(--p->count == 0){
00382      (p->buf) = get16bitWord(&(p->pdata[inpos]));
00383      inpos += 2;
00384         p->count= 0x10;
00385     }else
00386         p->buf >>= 1;
00387 
00388     return b;
00389 }
00390 
00391 unsigned long Cunlzexe::HeaderSize(){
00392  return m_headersize;
00393 }
